page.shortlink: UX Properties Prompt before refreshing schema
page.description: Display a confirmation prompt before refreshing the schema. The prompt is shown below. This property is displayed when the 'Automatically refresh schema of tables when componenent is opened for editing' property is checked. You can opt for the 'NoPrompt' option, in which case the component will open withouta a refresh prompt being displayed.

step.description: Open the UX Properties page for a data-bound UX component scroll down to the 'Data Binding' section. Check the 'Automatically refresh schema of tables when componenent is opened for editing' property.
Set the 'Prompt before refreshing schema' property to 'Prompt'
Save the UX component and close it.
Re-open the same data bound component from the Web-Projects Control Panel.
You should see the prompt displayed.
